comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Anne Morgan was from the prominent Morgan family (her brother was president of J. P. Morgan); in 1914 she was fundraising for WWI relief as head of the American Committee For Devastated France: www.themorgan.org/exhibitions/online/annemorgan/filming-t... There's audio of her voice here, speaking from Paris during her similar efforts in 1939: www.themorgan.org/exhibitions/online/annemorgan/voice-of-...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: @pennylrichardsca:  Thanks for the special 'sound link.'  Amazing to hear her voice. -- Helena

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca:

Thanks very much for the additional information on Ms. Morgan as well as that audio clip. Fascinating! We'll update the record to reflect more detail.
